scripts.update-fork:
(test -z $NODE_ENV || test $NODE_ENV == 'development') && (echo 'Updating imdi-fork, hang on...
' && rm -Rf .imdi-fork.tmp && git clone --quiet git@github.com:bengler/imdi-no .imdi-fork.tmp && cd .imdi-fork.tmp && git checkout --quiet master && git pull --rebase git@github.com:netliferesearch/imdi-no.git master && git push origin master && cd .. && rm -Rf .imdi-fork.tmp) || echo ''
scripts.postinstall: npm run update-fork && npm run check-imdi-no-dep
scripts.check-imdi-no-dep: test $(npm ls | grep 'imdi-no#' | cut -d '#' -f 2- | cut -d ')' -f 1) == $(git ls-remote git@github.com:bengler/imdi-no.git | grep refs/heads/master | cut -f 1) && echo 'A new version of bengler/imdi-no is available. Do you want to upgrade? [Y/n]:'; read -r -e answer; if [[ $answer = '' || $answer = [yY] ]]; then npm run upgrade-imdi-no; fi
scripts.upgrade-imdi-no:
npm i -S git+ssh://git@github.com:bengler/imdi-no && npm ls imdi-no && echo 'Upgraded imdi-no. Remember to run "npm shrink --dev" before committing!
'
